name: Goblin Gauntlet (tynanr09)
description:
It was written in stone that every 13 years a new Goblin King must be crowned.

It was later amended, when the Goblin Kingdom realized the ludicrous turnover of being a goblin king, damn adventurers...

It is now time to enter the gauntlet to crown the new king.  Bombs will be thrown, many will perish.  Only the last one left through the five stages will be crowned king of the goblins!

Controls
Move Left:  'A' or Left Arrow Key
Move Right: 'D' or Right Arrow Key
Jump: Space (Hold to jump higher)
Grab/Throw Bomb: Shift (Left or Right)
Escape: Quit Game

Credits
Programming and Design by Richard Tynan
